title: Minecraft Java版 20w12a 发布
author: SPGoding
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2020-3-19 11:13 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft Java版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。在快照中打开存档前请务必进行备份。适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.16 仍未发布，20w12a 为其第 7 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



NEWS

Minecraft Snapshot 20w12a
Minecraft 快照 20w12a
A Minecraft Java Snapshot
Minecraft Java版快照


Ever wanted to take a quick nap in a biome full of lava and with dangers lurking around every corner? Good news! We've just added the Respawn Anchor that lets you set your spawn point in the Nether. Just make sure that you have enough charges.
你是否曾想过在这充满熔岩暗藏危机的群系里睡个小觉？好消息来啦！我们添加了能够让你在下界设置重生点的 Respawn Anchor（重生锚）。你只需要确保能量足够就可以啦。

New Features in 20w12a
20w12a 中的新特性

Added the respawn anchor that can set your respawn point in the Nether. Use while holding Glowstone to charge to?a maximum of four charges - each respawn depletes one charge添加了能够让你在下界设置重生点的重生锚。使用萤石可以给它充能，最多 4 点 —— 每次重生都会消耗 1 点充能。Added polished basalt! Smelt your basalt to make it clean and shiny!添加磨制玄武岩！冶炼玄武岩即可让它变得干净闪亮！Warped and crimson nylium can now be bonemealed to get more of the strange new vegetation现在可以对绯红菌岩和诡异菌岩使用骨粉了，获得更多这种奇怪的植被吧！Hoes are now the appropriate tool for sponges and wet sponges锄现在是开采海绵和湿海绵的合适工具了


Changes in 20w12a
20w12a 中的改动

When fishing, treasure loot can now only be obtained by fishing in open waters现在只有在开阔水域中钓鱼才能获得宝藏战利品了Reduced the maximum distance a bee can wander away from its home hive when randomly wandering to around 22 blocks将蜜蜂离开蜂巢漫游的最大距离减少到大致 22 格Nether gold ore can now be mined with any type of pickaxe and drops a few gold nuggets下界金矿石现在可以被任何种类的镐开采，并直接掉落一些金粒Parrots imitate hostile mobs less often减少了鹦鹉模仿敌对生物的频率Parrots do not randomly imitate hostile mobs when gamemode is on peaceful鹦鹉不再在和平模式下随机模仿敌对生物了New mood detection algorithm for cave sounds洞穴音效有了新的情绪探测算法


Technical Changes in 20w12a
20w12a 中的技术性改动

The spawnpoint command now supports being run in any dimensionspawnpoint 命令现在可以在任何维度中执行了


UUIDs in NBT
NBT 中的 UUID

UUIDs stored in NBT are now represented as an array of four integers.
NBT 中的 UUID 现在使用由四个整型数字（integer）组成的数组来表示了。

Example:{UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]}
例子：{UUID:[I;1498693494,1027158888,1898994005,860320107]}

Along with that a couple of fields have been renamed:
以及一些字段被重命名了：

OwnerUUID of tamed animals, area effect clouds, evoker fangs and projectiles is now simply Owner被驯服的动物、药水云、尖牙和弹射物的 OwnerUUID 简化为了 OwnerTrustedUUIDs of foxes is now Trusted狐狸的 TrustedUUIDs 重命名为了 Trustedtarget_uuid of conduits is now Target潮涌核心的 target_uuid 重命名为了 Target


Loot Tables
战利品表

Entity Predicate
实体谓词

Added fishing_hook sub-predicate添加了 fishing_hook 子谓词


Fishing Hook
Fishing Hook（鱼钩）

Check properties of the fishing hook检测一个鱼钩的属性


Parameter
参数

in_open_water - Matches whether the fishing location is open water fishing or not. A fishing location is considered to?be open water if there are no blocks above water and no solid underwater blocks around, all water blocks are source blocks and there are no bubble columns.in_open_water - 检测是否是在开阔水域钓鱼。开阔水域表示水上方没有方块、水里面没有具有碰撞箱的方块、所有水方块均为水源且无气泡柱的水域。


Fixed bugs in 20w12a
20w12a 中修复的漏洞

MC-3328 - Dismounting an entity places riding entity / player half block too highMC-3328 - 从实体上面下来的骑行实体 / 玩家的位置高了半格MC-64242 - Silent tag is not working for some entitiesMC-64242 - Silent 标签对某些实体没用MC-100342 - Several Non-Ticking blocks are marked as ticking forcing the growth-algorithm to check chunks needlesslyMC-100342 - 有些并没有随机刻功能的方块被标记为了 ticking，导致植物生长算法毫无必要地检测许多区块MC-113809 - Chorus Flower plant, Bamboo, Sugarcane, Cactus and other plants grow instantly when supporting block is replaced with same block typeMC-113809 - 紫颂花、竹子、甘蔗、仙人掌以及其他植物会在支撑方块被相同方块替换时立刻生长MC-114000 - Mouse click in cat hissing soundsMC-114000 - 猫的嘶嘶音效里有鼠标点击的声音MC-122128 - Recipe book resets itself to closed state after deathMC-122128 - 玩家死亡后配方书会自动变成关闭状态MC-129137 - Parrots imitating hostile mobs in peaceful is not that peacefulMC-129137 - 和平模式下鹦鹉也会模仿敌对生物，孩子听到了根本把持不住MC-130137 - Grass and mycelium don’t decay underwaterMC-130137 - 水下的草方块和菌丝不会变成土MC-140545 - Pathfinding prefers North (negative Z) directionMC-140545 - 生物寻路喜欢往北（Z 轴负方向）走MC-148936 - Parrot summoned with negative Age has smaller hitboxMC-148936 - 生成出的 Age 为负数的鹦鹉的碰撞箱会小一些MC-149375 - Camera can be positioned inside of snow layersMC-149375 - 玩家视角可以位于雪层和灵魂沙内部MC-160959 - Clicking onto a bed in daytime doesn’t grant the advancement “Sweet Dreams”MC-160959 - 白天右键床不能获得「甜蜜的梦」进度MC-161754 - Item duplication with chested donkeys, mules and llamasMC-161754 - 戴着箱子的驴、骡子和羊驼的物品复制MC-163918 - Bees not animating their pollen gatheringMC-163918 - 蜜蜂采蜜时没有动画MC-166980 - Bees become stuck wandering to the north-west after completing a task, or randomly in large numbersMC-166980 - 蜜蜂完成一个 AI 任务后（或随机）会一直朝着西北方向飞MC-168384 - NBT-Tag “Silent:1b” doesn’t work for bees.MC-168384 - NBT 标签 “Silent: 1b” 对蜜蜂没用MC-169965 - Potion effect timers for higher levels can remain at 0:00 after the higher level has run out if multiple levels of the same effect were applied in descending orderMC-169965 - 按等级降序施加多个等级的同一药水效果以后，当较高等级的效果用尽而较低等级的效果仍然存在时，尽管此时真正起效的是较低等级的效果，物品栏内显示的界面中显示的是剩余时间保持为 0:00 的较高等级的效果MC-170584 - Structure taiga_meeting_point_2 from zombie villages has 1 misrotated logMC-170584 - 僵尸村庄的 taiga_meeting_point_2 结构有 1 个方向错误的原木方块MC-170591 - Misrotated floor blocks in desert_tool_smith_1 basementMC-170591 - desert_tool_smith_1 地下室里有方向错误的地板带釉陶瓦MC-170773 - Recipe book and filtering craftable do not stay open for blast furnace and smoker when (re)loading the worldMC-170773 - 高炉与烟熏炉中开启了「仅显示可合成」的配方书会在加载/重新加载世界后关闭MC-170940 - Netherite ingot recipes are not groupedMC-170940 - 下界合金锭的两种合成配方（从下界合金块合成、用下界合金碎片与金锭合成）没有显示在同一组内MC-171133 - Camera can be positioned inside of soul sandMC-171133 - 灵魂沙透视MC-172188 - Hoglins are not required by ‘Two by Two’ advancementMC-172188 - 「成双成对」进度并不需要玩家繁殖疣猪兽MC-172690 - Smelting netherite scraps doesn’t provide the right amount of experienceMC-172690 - 冶炼下界合金碎片产生的经验数量不正确MC-172820 - Piglins can turn into adult chicken jockeys in the overworldMC-172820 - 猪灵可能会转换为成年僵尸猪灵鸡骑士MC-173199 - Fossils in the nether cause caves / floating islands to generate and can break through the nether roofMC-173199 - 下界化石会导致生成的洞穴或浮空岛穿过下界顶层MC-173220 - Dismounting passenger moves to a nearby block when ridden entity diesMC-173220 - 被骑乘实体死亡后，骑乘实体似乎会被传送到附近一个随机的位置MC-173420 - Sign crafting recipes of various wood types are not groupedMC-173420 - 不同木头种类的告示牌的合成配方没有显示在同一组中MC-173487 - Falling out of water death message still does not seem to appearMC-173487 - 仍然不显示从水里摔出去的死亡信息MC-173552 - Nether Fossile support islands cut off at chunk bordersMC-173552 - 下界化石的支撑岛会在区块边界处切断MC-173791 - Mobs dismount vehicles only in front of the boat, even if there is danger aheadMC-173791 - 从船上下来的实体只会到船的前头，就算前面很危险（比如有熔岩）也会如此MC-173828 - Village church entrance does not generate correctlyMC-173828 - 村庄教堂的入口生成不正确MC-173832 - Crimson and Warped Hyphae and Stripped Hyphae are switched in Creative inventoryMC-173832 - 创造模式物品栏中绯红菌核与扭曲菌核、去皮绯红菌核与去皮扭曲菌核的顺序跟其他木板和菌柄的顺序不一致MC-173837 - Removing fire and soul fire with shears will reduce the shears’ durabilityMC-173837 - 用剪刀破坏火和灵魂火会消耗剪刀耐久MC-174049 - Fireworks shot from a crossbow do not explode instantly when hitting a solid blockMC-174049 - 弩发射出的烟花火箭不会在撞到固体方块时立刻爆炸MC-174071 - Roof of savanna_mason_1 is cut offMC-174071 - savanna_mason_1 的房顶被截断了MC-174072 - Structure savanna_temple_2 contains one misrotated blockMC-174072 - 结构  savanna_temple_2 中有一个旋转错误的方块MC-174073 - Two misrotated blocks in savanna_small_house_5MC-174073 - 结构 savanna_small_house_5 中有两个旋转错误的方块MC-174075 - Misrotated block in savanna_butchers_shop_1MC-174075 - 结构 savanna_butchers_shop_1 中有旋转错误的方块MC-174076 - Inconsistent rotation of logs under windows in savanna_small_house_4MC-174076 - 结构 savanna_small_house_4 中窗户下面的原木旋转不一致MC-174077 - Structure snowy_library_1 no longer has snow under the roofMC-174077 - 结构 snowy_library_1 屋顶上不再有雪了MC-174078 - Three misrotated blocks in snowy_armorer_house_2MC-174078 - 结构 snowy_armorer_house_2 中有 3 个旋转错误的方块MC-174079 - Misrotated block at snowy_weapon_smith_1MC-174079 - 结构 snowy_weapon_smith_1 中有旋转错误的方块MC-174082 - Three misrotated blocks in snowy_small_house_2MC-174082 - 结构 snowy_small_house_2 中有 3 个旋转错误的方块MC-174083 - Three misrotated blocks in snowy_butchers_shop_1MC-174083 - 结构 snowy_butchers_shop_1 中有 3 个旋转错误的方块MC-174174 - Arrow animation stuck on loop when a flame bow is used to detonate TNTMC-174174 - 火矢点燃 TNT 以后会循环播放飞行动画MC-174234 - Village structure snowy_masons_house_1 has two misrotated blocksMC-174234 - 村庄结构 snowy_masons_house_1 中有两个旋转错误的方块MC-174258 - Fixed item frames do not take void damageMC-174258 - Fixed: 1b 的物品展示框免疫虚空伤害MC-174391 - Several misrotated blocks at snowy_medium_house_2MC-174391 - 结构 snowy_medium_house_2 中有几个旋转错误的方块MC-174429 - Chorus flowers remove arrow and trident velocityMC-174429 - 紫颂花会移除箭与三叉戟的速度MC-174464 - Soul speed decreases durability on boots in creative modeMC-174464 - 创造模式下灵魂疾行也会消耗靴子的耐久MC-174466 - Soul speed particles are generated in spectator modeMC-174466 - 旁观者模式下也会产生灵魂疾行的粒子效果MC-174467 - Placing fire on soul sand does not place soul fireMC-174467 - 在灵魂沙上放的火不会变成灵魂火MC-174476 - Soul fire torch is in the piglin_repellents item tag twiceMC-174476 - piglin_repellents 物品标签里灵魂火把出现了两次MC-174480 - Piglins are not attracted to Nether gold oreMC-174480 - 猪灵对丢在地上的下界金矿石没有兴趣MC-174489 - Shroomlight preferred tool is now both Axe and HoeMC-174489 - 斧和锄都可以加速采集菌光体MC-174502 - Soul Speed 3 on Soul Soil in water keeps and increases player momentumMC-174502 - 在水里的灵魂土上穿着灵魂疾行Ⅲ的靴子会导致玩家速度不断增加MC-174513 - Soul Speed Enchanted Books from bartering with piglins do not work in an anvilMC-174513 - 铁砧里不能使用从猪灵交换到的灵魂疾行附魔书MC-174522 - Soul Speed doesn’t break bootsMC-174522 - 灵魂疾行不会破坏掉靴子MC-174690 - Soul speed enchantment books can be found in chestsMC-174690 - 箱子里可以找到灵魂疾行附魔书MC-174785 - Mining speed of crimson and warped wall signs is not affected by an axeMC-174785 - 斧不影响墙上的绯红木告示牌与墙上的诡异木告示牌的开采速度



官方服务端下载地址Minecraft server.jar

正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其他https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。Java版的启动器下载地址在上文已经提供。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文）Grum的Twitter（英文）Searge的Twitter（英文）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

replies.author: Sapherise
replies.txt_content: 很开心自己之前的想法和官方的想法那么的一致：让玩家的付出和回报不对等加大了游戏的快餐化。看到0 tick和自动钓鱼被修复了，感到很欣慰，官方在做正确的事。

请问什么是情绪探测算法……
难道说洞穴音效会随着玩家的情绪变化而变化吗

看了wiki,重生锚会在主世界/末地充能时爆炸,新的即时性炸炸弹来了

另外,下界金矿石有点
现在挖掘时会掉落2-6个金粒，而非它本身。

    如同其他矿石一样受时运魔咒影响，当使用时运III魔咒时最大可掉落24个金粒。
    下界金矿石仍可以单独烧炼成1个金锭
